---
name: Sound effects
about: Add audio feedback
title: 'Add sound effects for moves and wins'
labels: enhancement, frontend
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Add audio feedback when placing X/O and when winning/losing.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Sound when placing a move
- [ ] Victory sound when winning
- [ ] Defeat sound when losing
- [ ] Mute/unmute toggle
- [ ] Sounds don't autoplay on page load

## Technical Notes
- Use Web Audio API or HTML5 audio
- Store preference in localStorage
- Keep audio files small
